page.title: 08Connaught Hall in Fulford
page.content:
Connaught Court is a private residential home for retired people. It is owned by the Benevolent Society of Freemasons. The following is the response to ashort interview:
{ "It's been open for sixteen years {and there's room for a hundred {residents, eighty singles in private {rooms and ten couples in bungalows. {Each room has its own toilet but {bathrooms are shared. { We've got three T.V. rooms, a {snooker room, an art and craft room {and a bowling green. We have little {outings too...and we have all the {necessary medical services, doctors, {nurses, chiropodist and {physiotherapist, visiting weekly. { It's our biggest home in Britain." { {
